text: Encrypted filesystem may refer to: * Filesystem-level encryption, a form of disk encryption where individual files or directories are encrypted by the file system itself * Encrypting File System, the Microsoft Windows encryption subsystem of NTFS ==See also== * Disk encryption, which uses encrypts every bit of data that goes on a disk or disk volume * Disk encryption hardware * Disk encryption software * Hardware-based full disk encryption
title: Encrypted filesystem
